name: PAX East 2013 Promo Pack B
white_cards: Getting inside the Horadric Cube with a hot babe and pressing the transmute button.
Loan sharks or left sharks, whichever
Punching a tree to gather wood.
Spending the year's insulin budget on Warhammer 40k figurines.
The desparate girl who wanted to be a mom so bad that she robbed a sperm bank.
Violating the First Law of Robotics.

black_cards.text: Action stations! Action stations! Set condition one throughout the fleet and brace for _____!
In the final round of this year's Omegathon, Omeganauts must face off in a game of _____.
